name: LoveZ
description:
LoveZ is a multiplayer game where two (or more) players use the same keyboard to control two characters that are looking for each other while a strange form of zombie apocalypse is happening.

As the virus spread through your body you lose control and start to wander around, eventually you will turn into a zombie! Do not fret, you can still find your soul mate…and eat him!

Local Multiplayer with changing controls and different victory outcomes. You can play it as a co-op or PvP. Eat or you will be eaten…or not.

Made with Unity, using Grids Pro
